title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Military and Terror Targets in Southern Lebanon: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Military buildings and terror infrastructures; the IDF attacked terror targets of Hezbollah in southern Lebanon

A short time ago, combat aircraft attacked military buildings and terrorist infrastructures of Hezbollah in the area of ita Al Shaab and in the wide range in southern Lebanon. In addition, combat aircraft attacked during the day a terror infrastructure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the area of Tyr Harfa in southern Lebanon.

Earlier today, two missile launchings were identified towards the area of Shetula, causing damage in place and there were no casualties, the IDF attacked the sources of fire.
